text: 'iinak ya allh 'iin tueadhibhum fa'iinahum eibaduk -want 'aelam bahwalhm-, tafeal bihim ma tasha' bedlk, wa'iin taghfir birahmatik liman 'ataa minhum basbab almghfrt, fa'iinak 'ant aleaziz aldhy la yghalabu, alhakim fi tdbyrh wamrh. whdhh alayat thna' ealaa allah -teala- bhkmth wedlh, wkmal elmh
